text: The UEFA European Under-18 Championship 1955 Final Tournament was held in Italy. During this edition, only group matches were played and no winner was declared. This was done to prevent a leftover of competition. Romania, Italy, Bulgaria, Hungary and Czechoslovakia were the five group winners. ==Teams== The following teams entered the tournament: * * * * * * * * * (host) * * * * * * * * * * ==Group A== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 3 1 +2 5 3 2 0 1 7 3 +4 4 3 1 0 2 4 6 –2 2 3 0 1 2 1 5 –4 1 6 April 2–0 1–0 8 April 5–2 1–1 10 April 1–0 2–0 ==Group B== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 4 0 +4 4 2 0 1 1 0 1 –1 1 2 0 1 1 0 3 –3 1 7 April 3–0 9 April 0–0 11 April 1–0 ==Group C== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 13 4 +9 5 3 2 1 0 8 3 +5 5 3 0 1 2 3 10 –7 1 3 0 1 2 2 9 –7 1 7 April 2–2 1–1 9 April 5–1 3–1 11 April 6–1 3–0 ==Group D== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 10 1 +9 6 3 2 0 1 8 2 +6 4 3 1 0 2 4 6 –2 2 3 0 0 3 3 16 –13 0 6 April 1–0 5–1 8 April 7–0 3–0 10 April 2–0 4–2 ==Group E== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 6 2 +4 6 3 1 1 1 3 2 +1 3 3 1 0 2 4 6 –2 2 3 0 1 2 3 6 –3 1 7 April 1–0 3–1 9 April 3–1 3–2 11 April 0–0 2–0 ==Other websites== *Results by RSSSF Category:UEFA European Under-19 Championship Category:1955 in sports Category:1955 in Europe
